title: Gizem & Davide'nin Düğünü
code_request: Etkinlik detaylarına erişmek için sizinle paylaştığımız kodu giriniz.
attendence:
Please let us know if you will join us by May 15th.
Just send us a message telling us who's coming with you, if you have any dietary restrictions and those sort of things
it_faq_3: Are you going to play my favorite song?
it_info_2: No, if you'd like to give us a small gift we'd be happy to get a contribution for our honeymoon
it_info_3: We'll try! Tap this text to go to our collaborative Spotify playlist where you can add your requested songs
